nodes.comment: Masks do not decrease the spread of disease for healthy people.
nodes.author: Lori Holmes
nodes.extracted: Masks do not decrease the spread of disease for healthy people.

nodes.comment:
I have tried to have a balanced perspective about the range of responses universities have had to Covid-19. My husband teaches high school history. He has faithfully taught in person classes for the entire school year. The school has taken many precautions and has had minimal impact from Covid-19.  At the same time I have listened weekly to the podcast, the Osterholm Update, in an effort to understand the public health issues around Covid-19. 
Now that we know more than we did 1 year ago, I think it’s clear that UVA’s restrictions are excessive. Please consider the cost to our students’ mental health and reduce the restrictions. We must find a balance between living safely and LIVING. There are precautions that can be put in place to create a more interactive learning environment. The risk of the spread of Covid-19 is not the only risk to consider, nor is it the most important. I appreciate that these are difficult decisions, but it is imperative to to change the current environment at UVA. 
Finally, it grieves me that these students feel that they must protest anonymously!  If this does not grieve the UVA administration, then you should consider what your purpose is. Please ask yourselves how you have allowed students to become fearful of dialog.
nodes.author: Carey Albritton
nodes.extracted: The risk of the spread of Covid-19 is not the only risk to consider, nor is it the most important.

nodes.comment: Our kids need NO MASKS! It is beyond wrong to do this when there is no evidence that kids are the problem. I work at a school and all I see is kids taking their masks up and down. Constantly! Then touching everything around them.  Doesn't that just spread more germs.  Where is the common sense anymore. They are just kids. Look at the statistics in this county!
nodes.author: Jessica Bach
nodes.extracted: Doesn't that just spread more germs.

nodes.comment: Originally masks were to “flatten the curve” and “slow the spread”.   We have accomplished those things and have not overwhelmed the heath care system. It’s time to see smiles again.
nodes.author: Brandi Strain
nodes.extracted: Originally masks were to “flatten the curve” and “slow the spread”.

nodes.comment: Masks do not help stop the spread of COVID and they are stupid.
nodes.author: Teresa Dees
nodes.extracted: Masks do not help stop the spread of COVID and they are stupid.

nodes.comment: There is no scientific evidence that Homemade masks do not work to stop the spread of a virus of this particle size. The vaccine is not approved and is not needed for this age group.
nodes.author: Jessica Hinkle
nodes.extracted: There is no scientific evidence that Homemade masks do not work to stop the spread of a virus of this particle size.

nodes.comment: No data leads to masks being effective against the spread of Covid 19, but it does lead to depression, anxiety, and our children becoming introverted and less social. In addition, Covid numbers are lower than they have ever been. It’s less than the flu. Mask optional is the only way to go.
nodes.author: Jennifer Miller Jacobi
nodes.extracted: No data leads to masks being effective against the spread of Covid 19, but it does lead to depression, anxiety, and our children becoming introverted and less social.

nodes.comment: Masks have been proven to be ineffective against preventing the spread of covid and they have been proven to collect dangerous pathogens.
nodes.author: BARRY COLE
nodes.extracted: Masks have been proven to be ineffective against preventing the spread of covid and they have been proven to collect dangerous pathogens.

nodes.comment: There is no scientific evidence that masking the students will stop the spread of Covid or any other virus. We are wasting our children’s youth and their learning ability. Many children get dizzy and can’t breathe if they are wearing them all day. It’s silly to think anyone can perform a high quality of education when your brain is lacking oxygen. Stop this immediately.
nodes.author: Koula Mandas
nodes.extracted: There is no scientific evidence that masking the students will stop the spread of Covid or any other virus.

nodes.comment: There is no clinical trial peer review case study for any of the eleven coronavirus including the common cold or flu that have shown that masks stop the spread
nodes.author: Steve Hacko
nodes.extracted: There is no clinical trial peer review case study for any of the eleven coronavirus including the common cold or flu that have shown that masks stop the spread

nodes.comment: We now have a year plus of data that shows masks don't work to stop or slow the spread of viruses.  We know that masks have a negative impact on our children's development and can cause all sorts of mental and physical health disorders.  We also know children under 17 have 99.97% recovery rate.  Time to stop the madness.
nodes.author: Brian Wright
nodes.extracted: We now have a year plus of data that shows masks don't work to stop or slow the spread of viruses.

nodes.comment: I'm signing because children do not need to wear masks in school because they are very unlikely to spread COVID. It is best to leave mask wearing up to the preference of parents for their children.
nodes.author: Hollie Briggs
nodes.extracted: I'm signing because children do not need to wear masks in school because they are very unlikely to spread COVID.

nodes.comment:
1. Multiple studies have shown that masks DO NOT stop the spread a viruses. 
2. Children are at low risk from Covid. 
3. The CDC itself has said multiple times children are not the vectors of Covid. 
4. Our children’s deteriorating mental health is of great concern. They need to get back to normal school setting. 
5. Multiple districts around the country resumed class maskless with little to no spread of Covid.
nodes.author: Amy Olson
nodes.extracted: Multiple studies have shown that masks DO NOT stop the spread a viruses. [...] Multiple districts around the country resumed class maskless with little to no spread of Covid.

nodes.comment: Kids are at very low risk to contract or spread Covid and masks are dangerous for kids.
nodes.author: Julee Baida
nodes.extracted: Kids are at very low risk to contract or spread Covid and masks are dangerous for kids.

nodes.comment: Children are the least likely to be seriously ill from covid and least likely to spread it.
nodes.author: Andrew Gross
nodes.extracted: Children are the least likely to be seriously ill from covid and least likely to spread it.

nodes.comment: Kids DONT spread or get this virus!! Do NOt use my kid as a pawn for your liberal crap!!
nodes.author: Jason Lovell
nodes.extracted: Kids DONT spread or get this virus!!

nodes.comment: Masks do not work to prevent the spread of viruses.
nodes.author: Sandra Jones
nodes.extracted: Masks do not work to prevent the spread of viruses.

nodes.comment: Face masks are useless. They don't stop anything but breathing snd accumulate bacteria and things we shouldn't be breathing.  Kids don't spread virus like adults.
nodes.author: Loretta Browning
nodes.extracted: Kids don't spread virus like adults.

nodes.comment: Masks do not prevent the spread of viruses and they do more harm to our children than good.
nodes.author: kelly ginter
nodes.extracted: Masks do not prevent the spread of viruses and they do more harm to our children than good.

nodes.comment: This should be optional & up to each child’s parent.  I’ve read a tremendous amount of data, studies & listened to doctors, virologists, & immunologists on either side of this & while I am nothing more than a lay person on the street, I try to be as logical as I can about this & all matters regarding covid & my own personal well being.  I have grave concerns about the dangers of masks themselves & the harm they can do.  When reading comments & hearing conversations where it’s been said “it’s only a mask; what could it hurt?”  The people who are saying this couldn’t have invested the time to learn all they can about the dangers of masks.  I have spent many hours & days studying information & there is nothing that has been  proven to show that masks are beneficial in reducing the spread of this virus or any sickness.  My only regret is I wish I had saved the CDCs own study about masks that was posted on their website in mid to late summer 2020, but was removed a few days afterwards.  Masks harbor germs & are germ infested once the first breath is taken through one.  I am unable to wear a mask due to personal reasons, but even if I could, I believe I would have to decline doing so for other health reasons.  I suffer from two chronic immune system diseases, so I am not in a position to take that kind of a chance.  Children & their health & well being which includes their mental state are the focus of this petition & I agree the mandatory decision made by some of the school board members is not the best decision.  Parents should be the ones making the decision about their own children.  Parents know their children’s medical conditions & their day to day well being.  I believe the parents that say their children were suffering from wearing masks.   I think the board should reconsider their decision & agree that optional masking should be allowed.
nodes.author: Teresa Crawford
nodes.extracted: I have spent many hours & days studying information & there is nothing that has been  proven to show that masks are beneficial in reducing the spread of this virus or any sickness.

nodes.comment: I believe in parental rights.  Studies have not shown masks to be effective in stopping the spread of covid 19 but studies have shown that masks are damaging to children.  Parents are the best advocates for their children and can make decisions based on true science
nodes.author: Martin and Lisa Goedken
nodes.extracted: Studies have not shown masks to be effective in stopping the spread of covid 19 but studies have shown that masks are damaging to children.

nodes.comment: Masks DON’T work. Read the side of the box, none of them prevent the spread of any disease. Plus, it decreases the O2 levels in the bloodstream.
nodes.author: Andrew Noller
nodes.extracted: Read the side of the box, none of them prevent the spread of any disease.

nodes.comment: Vaccines have been available for an ample amount of time for all adults who want  to be vaccinated against COVID-19. Also, several studies have shown that cloth masks do not prevent the spread of COVID-19. At this point I don’t believe mandatory masking of our children is reasonable.
nodes.author: Sandra Godawski
nodes.extracted: Also, several studies have shown that cloth masks do not prevent the spread of COVID-19.

nodes.comment: Mask do not prevent spread!. They cause more harm than good.
nodes.author: Michael Stokes
nodes.extracted: Mask do not prevent spread!.

nodes.comment: No child or adult she be forced to wear a mask. It is unhealthy! Period! It does not stop the spread! Studies prove it! It’s unGodly & unconstitutional! It is pure child abuse in my opinion!
nodes.author: Angela Sladovnik
nodes.extracted: It does not stop the spread!

nodes.comment: Children need to breathe. It’s a no brainer. Masks spread disease.
nodes.author: Margaret Starry
nodes.extracted: Masks spread disease.

nodes.comment: Mandates erode the public's confidence in public health organizations. Given that we started at two weeks to slow the spread, it's time for public health organizations to actually trust the public. We are well aware of the global pandemic and actually know what's best for the whole health of our kids.
nodes.author: Ben Grafton
nodes.extracted: Given that we started at two weeks to slow the spread, it's time for public health organizations to actually trust the public.

nodes.comment: Masks do not effectively slow a viral spread. Masks cause weakened immune systems. Masks also handicap the pshycological development of children. There is no reason what so ever to mask society now that we have scientific medical studies that outline the ineffectiveness of mask wearing in a public setting.
nodes.author: jennifer bertram
nodes.extracted: Masks do not effectively slow a viral spread.

nodes.comment:
I'm signing because it is unnatural and unhealthy for children to wear masks all day, especially while trying to learn.  And the covid virus poses very little risk to children.

Meanwhile, mask mandates have have shown NO difference to the spread of the virus compared to regions that imposed strict mandates.
nodes.author: Del Teeter
nodes.extracted: Meanwhile, mask mandates have have shown NO difference to the spread of the virus compared to regions that imposed strict mandates.

nodes.comment: Masking is everyones responsibility avoiding covid spread. Many who lost their loved ones are mourning. Don’t understand Whats harm in masking. I think, Life is more valuable than little discomfort.
nodes.author: Mandate Masking
nodes.extracted: Masking is everyones responsibility avoiding covid spread.

nodes.comment: Masks are unhealthy and do NOT help prevent the spread of the virus. Parents should be the ones to decide if their child wears a mask or not. If this does not change now it never will, and children will suffer for it in the future.
nodes.author: Emily Koester
nodes.extracted: Masks are unhealthy and do NOT help prevent the spread of the virus.

nodes.comment: Masks are useless. They do nothing to stop the spread of any virus or bacteria. A 70 nanometer virus is going through any cloth(misc material) mask. Nobody should be mandated to wear them, ever!!
nodes.author: Wanda Anderson
nodes.extracted: They do nothing to stop the spread of any virus or bacteria.

nodes.comment: On multiple occasions last year my son would come home complaining or a head ache, light headedness and unable to focus. I do not believe mandating masks are going to aid the spread of COVID 19 it's time we stand up for our children's rights!
nodes.author: Amanda Seward
nodes.extracted: I do not believe mandating masks are going to aid the spread of COVID 19 it's time we stand up for our children's rights!

nodes.comment: Masks are not helping prevent the spread of any virus in our schools. They become filthy throughout the day and it is abusive to force them wear them. They are causing division and emotional suffering. And above all, it should be the parent’s and child’s choice.
nodes.author: Michael Bacon
nodes.extracted: Masks are not helping prevent the spread of any virus in our schools.

nodes.comment: Science and logic tells us the masks do nothing to stop "virus" transmissions. It is just for show to help spread the fear narrative from the left. If you can still smell a fart, you can still catch and spread a smaller virus.
nodes.author: Kevin Layton
nodes.extracted: It is just for show to help spread the fear narrative from the left. [...] If you can still smell a fart, you can still catch and spread a smaller virus.

nodes.comment: Their is no science that says children are getting seriously sick or dying from this virus, the data says they do not spread the disease, and the masks being worn are ineffective at best and harmful at worse.  We need to turn over this woke school board!
nodes.author: Merle Thowe
nodes.extracted: Their is no science that says children are getting seriously sick or dying from this virus, the data says they do not spread the disease, and the masks being worn are ineffective at best and harmful at worse.

nodes.comment: Parents should have a choice about whether or not to mask their child. Not to mention they don’t help prevent the spread of COVID.
nodes.author: Cheryl DiNoia
nodes.extracted: Not to mention they don’t help prevent the spread of COVID.

nodes.comment: I believe that if masks stopped the spread we wouldn't be where we are today. Stop using our children as a pawn in the game! We want freedom for our kids!
nodes.author: Melissa Ferris
nodes.extracted: I believe that if masks stopped the spread we wouldn't be where we are today.

nodes.comment: Masks cause more harm than good for children. Let’s stop targeting children. They are not driving the spread of covid.
nodes.author: Dawn Durham
nodes.extracted: They are not driving the spread of covid.

nodes.comment: The research shows that masks do not stop the spread of a virus and have negative health and mental side effects.
nodes.author: Stephanie Danko
nodes.extracted: The research shows that masks do not stop the spread of a virus and have negative health and mental side effects.

nodes.comment: What's happening is chid abuse.  Discrimination & segregation if they refuse even on medical exemptions.  These children are getting staph infections on their faces & it can spread to their lung.  Anyone putting a mask on their child still should stop immediately & sign this petition!
nodes.author: Jessica Miller
nodes.extracted: These children are getting staph infections on their faces & it can spread to their lung.

nodes.comment: We worked all of 2020 and a great part of 2021 without a damn vaccine without hesitation! We worked overtime and tirelessly knowing the risks we took! We are not the problem!! We are trained professionals who from the start of our careers was trained on preventing the spread of infections and microorganisms! We are not the problem!
nodes.author: ariel jones
nodes.extracted: We are trained professionals who from the start of our careers was trained on preventing the spread of infections and microorganisms!

nodes.comment: I will pull my son again from public school if he’s forced to wear a masks. People like to lie & say that kids don’t mind wearing them. Well, mine DOES! He says he can’t breathe, & does not like them. I’m not going to force him to do this when there is zero science to back it up. Asymptotic spread is very rare, and children aren’t aloud to school sick. Stop the nonsense!
nodes.author: Lisa Jones
nodes.extracted: Asymptotic spread is very rare, and children aren’t aloud to school sick.

nodes.comment: Wearing masks reduces oxygen intake. It produces bacterias when exhaling. Bacteria are then breathed in, along with excessive CO2. The bacteria in the mask create viruses! It has been proven scientifically that these do not prevent the spread of Covid and its variants. It is nothing more than a control tactic and abusive. We have the right to choose. The option is always available for those who would feel safer wearing one, but it cannot be forced.
nodes.author: Jean Leonard
nodes.extracted: It has been proven scientifically that these do not prevent the spread of Covid and its variants.

nodes.comment: Masks do not stop the spread of this virus.
nodes.author: Russ Graham
nodes.extracted: Masks do not stop the spread of this virus.

nodes.comment: It should be a choice.  Masks have not been proven to prevent the spread of Covid, masks restrict oxygen and collect bacteria.  The Covid virus is small enough to pass through the mask making the mask ineffective.  If parents want their child to wear them, they can choose to wear them.  Others should not be mandated.
nodes.author: Kristin Scott
nodes.extracted: Masks have not been proven to prevent the spread of Covid, masks restrict oxygen and collect bacteria.

nodes.comment: Fabric masks do not stop spread. Handwashing, distancing, staying home when sick and good ventilation do far more good per recent studies.
nodes.author: Sara Kennedy
nodes.extracted: Fabric masks do not stop spread.

nodes.comment: I support Freedom and personal choice. I do not believe masks are significantly protective against the spread of virus. I do not believe that asymptomatic individuals, especially children, are significant spreaders of the virus. Masks are harmful long term and are detrimental to learning and communication. Risk reward does not favor masks.
nodes.author: John Wellspring
nodes.extracted: I do not believe masks are significantly protective against the spread of virus.

nodes.comment: Masks have not been proven to do anything to control or eliminate the spread of COVID, and our children shouldn’t be Unconstitutionally forced to wear a mask, nor should any mandate be pushed on ANY citizen!
nodes.author: Sean Weir
nodes.extracted: Masks have not been proven to do anything to control or eliminate the spread of COVID, and our children shouldn’t be Unconstitutionally forced to wear a mask, nor should any mandate be pushed on ANY citizen!

nodes.comment: I’m signing because it should be out right as to whether or not we choose the vaccination and no consequences should be held against anyone! I’m also signing because false information is being spread to our students and many are living in fear!! I hear it daily. They need to worry about their education and enjoy their college years..not live in an environment where there is so much division!
nodes.author: Rachel Hebert
nodes.extracted: I’m also signing because false information is being spread to our students and many are living in fear!!

nodes.comment: Masks should be optional period. They do nothing to stop the spread.
nodes.author: Amy Miller
nodes.extracted: They do nothing to stop the spread.

nodes.comment: NO ONE SHOULD BE MADE TO PUT ANYTHING INTO THEIR BODY. ITS UNCOSTITUTIONAL. THE COVID19 FLU IS NO LONGER A THREAT. THE DELTA VARIANT IS AND THIS JAB HAS BEEN FOUND TO NOT E EFFECTIVE IN CONTROLLING THE SPREAD. THERE IS REAL SCIENCE OUT THERE, NOT JUST MSM FEAR TACTICS. WHAT YOU ARE DOING IS WRONG ON EVERY LEVEL.
nodes.author: Peggy DeRemer
nodes.extracted: THE DELTA VARIANT IS AND THIS JAB HAS BEEN FOUND TO NOT E EFFECTIVE IN CONTROLLING THE SPREAD.

nodes.comment: My child my choice. Stop discriminating against our kids!! Vaccinated or not you can still spread the virus!
nodes.author: MissChristina Gonzales
nodes.extracted: Vaccinated or not you can still spread the virus!

nodes.comment: There is no science proving masks stop the spread. There is science demonstrating risks to breathing carbon dioxide, decreased oxygen levels present inside the mask, and an increase in bacterial infections and breathing issues, not to mention psychological harm from masking.
nodes.author: Cheryl Weber
nodes.extracted: There is no science proving masks stop the spread.

nodes.comment:
Masks don't work and if anything, increase the spread of germs through increased touches.  This is documented with actual credible data if you research the studies yourself and don't rely on the propagandists to spin them for you.

Masking also causes psychological damage and impede speech and interpersonal skill development.

This virus, which has never even been isolated, poses no risk to this age group.
nodes.author: Mike Lessman
nodes.extracted: Masks don't work and if anything, increase the spread of germs through increased touches.

nodes.comment: Medical Freedom needs to be added to our constitution.  Top people calling the shots are flip flopping and pay no attention to the studies in Denmark and where there’s harmful bacteria on masks, and where it says that masks have no significance in stopping the spread of tiny aerosols.  The most vaccinated country Israel has the largest amount of delta variants.  Where there is risk to mental health with wearing masks and physical health with taking an experimental, no animal trial  completed, and ingredients not yet given by FDA and ever changing vaccine, there must be choice.  Our constitution was founded on freedom of choice (of which mirrors God’s universal laws of free will in how created human beings in the likeness of him)  and there are HIPAA laws against people being segregated and asked about their health.
nodes.author: Stacey Pinski
nodes.extracted: Top people calling the shots are flip flopping and pay no attention to the studies in Denmark and where there’s harmful bacteria on masks, and where it says that masks have no significance in stopping the spread of tiny aerosols.

nodes.comment: Masks have been proven not to stop the spread and are harmful to children
nodes.author: Richard Larsen
nodes.extracted: Masks have been proven not to stop the spread and are harmful to children

nodes.comment: Masks do not precent the spread!
nodes.author: Kallie Frush
nodes.extracted: Masks do not precent the spread!

nodes.comment:
The masks doesn’t stop the spread of a killer disease., the demonrat run states are the only states trying to enforce it t
To try and control the people. It’s not about health and safety.it’s all political 
nodes.author: Charles Cady
nodes.extracted:
The masks doesn’t stop the spread of a killer disease., the demonrat run states are the only states trying to enforce it t
To try and control the people.

nodes.comment: I’m working in a hospital, I don’t want anyone to go through what my patients are going through. Stop the spread please mandate mask.
nodes.author: Satya Atluri
nodes.extracted: Stop the spread please mandate mask.

nodes.comment: As the parent of 3 CG students, I believe it is absolute insanity to continue to allow optional masking as cases grow exponentially. Last year we were not seeing spread within schools, this year we are. The difference? Not making masking universal. Please keep our kids safe.
nodes.author: Jana Hennessy
nodes.extracted: Last year we were not seeing spread within schools, this year we are.

nodes.comment: Truth (science says that masks are our best tool for limiting spread), goodness (the overall health of our schools), and beauty (being part of something bigger than yourself; banding together out of shared care  for others) each dictate that mandatory masks ought to be in our return to school plan.
nodes.author: Travis Clement
nodes.extracted: Truth (science says that masks are our best tool for limiting spread), goodness (the overall health of our schools), and beauty (being part of something bigger than yourself; banding together out of shared care  for others) each dictate that mandatory masks ought to be in our return to school plan.

nodes.comment: There shouldn't be a debate, we've learned masks absolutely slow the spread of COVID, and despite the uniformed believing this pandemic is over- it's not over yet.  Children under the age of 12 can not be vaccinated, adults should be protecting them from the virus. More and more children are being hospitalized for COVID, just because that may not be happening in Carroll County doesn't mean it won't happen if we aren't doing all we can to mitigate the spread. CCPS took away the virtual option so in person is the ONLY option, protect the children and require masks- it's the LEAST you can do.
nodes.author: Brenda Myers
nodes.extracted: There shouldn't be a debate, we've learned masks absolutely slow the spread of COVID, and despite the uniformed believing this pandemic is over- it's not over yet. [...] More and more children are being hospitalized for COVID, just because that may not be happening in Carroll County doesn't mean it won't happen if we aren't doing all we can to mitigate the spread.

nodes.comment: Masks were able to prevent community spread in my classroom last year. I support a 30 day mask policy for grades k-6.
nodes.author: Scott Wolfinger
nodes.extracted: Masks were able to prevent community spread in my classroom last year.

nodes.comment: As a healthcare professional I have seen the strain COVID 19 has placed on our healthcare system. The data is out there that shows that masks work to decrease spread and thus are our best bet for the schools (and our economy) to stay open.
nodes.author: Patricia Moore
nodes.extracted: The data is out there that shows that masks work to decrease spread and thus are our best bet for the schools (and our economy) to stay open.

nodes.comment: I have a child not old enough for vaccine with a history of airway issues.  I am a health care professional and know that masks decrease the spread of contagions.
nodes.author: Sheryl Grau
nodes.extracted: I am a health care professional and know that masks decrease the spread of contagions.

nodes.comment: I’m signing because I want our community to promote the health and welfare of its residents. It’s a pandemic, not politics. Masks prevent the spread, along with hand sanitizing and social distancing. Let’s be at least as smart as Columbia.
nodes.author: Allison Foster
nodes.extracted: Masks prevent the spread, along with hand sanitizing and social distancing.

nodes.comment: I am signing because I believe masks work in controlling the spread
nodes.author: Stephanie Hall
nodes.extracted: I am signing because I believe masks work in controlling the spread

nodes.comment: We cannot open schools until we get a handle on the community numbers.  Masks help the spread
nodes.author: Jennifer Whitaker
nodes.extracted: Masks help the spread

nodes.comment: Let's stop the spread
nodes.author: Cindy Howgate
nodes.extracted: Let's stop the spread

nodes.comment: You need to do your part to help stop the spread
nodes.author: Ashley Mann
nodes.extracted: You need to do your part to help stop the spread

nodes.comment: The city of Lubbock isn't doing enough to slow the spread because our elected officials are worried about political fallout. We need leadership to show that someone, anyone, is taking the soaring rates of infections seriously.
nodes.author: Shelby Knox
nodes.extracted: The city of Lubbock isn't doing enough to slow the spread because our elected officials are worried about political fallout.

nodes.comment: COVID-19 is serious and we all need to wear masks to decrease the numbers! Do some research Chandler Prep! Masks help slow the spread of COVID-19! I am an alumni of CPA and masks should definitely be worn!
nodes.author: Bridget Kiley
nodes.extracted: Masks help slow the spread of COVID-19!

nodes.comment: The spread of COVID won't stop or even slow down unless we take precautions seriously, especially when it comes to our children.
nodes.author: Rai Nix
nodes.extracted: The spread of COVID won't stop or even slow down unless we take precautions seriously, especially when it comes to our children.

nodes.comment: Our experts and scientists are saying masks are a prudent measure. Countries that have done better than us at controlling the spread wear masks. It protects the most vulnerable among us. Worst case, it can’t make our situation worse.
nodes.author: Rik Akey
nodes.extracted: Countries that have done better than us at controlling the spread wear masks.

nodes.comment: The spread of covid-19 is still rapidly increasing and we need to protect the student body
nodes.author: Hunter Wolfe
nodes.extracted: The spread of covid-19 is still rapidly increasing and we need to protect the student body

nodes.comment: I believe masks are important in stopping the spread or covid and the flu amongst our children
nodes.author: Crystal Pumarejo
nodes.extracted: I believe masks are important in stopping the spread or covid and the flu amongst our children

nodes.comment: Our kids need protected and masks are the easiest thing we can do to help prevent spread of this deadly virus.
nodes.author: Deonna Kereky
nodes.extracted: Our kids need protected and masks are the easiest thing we can do to help prevent spread of this deadly virus.

nodes.comment: To protect the children whether vaccinated or not !!!  Plus slow or stop the spread before another lockdown happens !!!  I'm starting to see the signs again !
nodes.author: Joy Weidner
nodes.extracted: Plus slow or stop the spread before another lockdown happens !!!

nodes.comment: Masks have been proven to be effective in preventing the spread of COVID 19. Money and politics have no place in a pandemic and our highest priority should be keeping our children safe.
nodes.author: Anne Burris
nodes.extracted: Masks have been proven to be effective in preventing the spread of COVID 19.

nodes.comment: If we all do our part we can stop the spread of this virus.
nodes.author: Jessica Everton
nodes.extracted: If we all do our part we can stop the spread of this virus.

nodes.comment: The health of our kids and communty is so important. We can mitigate the spread with science based practices and input from our local medical center leaders.
nodes.author: Stacie Smith
nodes.extracted: We can mitigate the spread with science based practices and input from our local medical center leaders.

nodes.comment: According to Dr. Rebecca Cosgrove, one of the COVID-19 experts at Fairview University, if everyone wore surgical masks in public, the spread of this virus would almost virtually come to a halt.  Those who don't wear masks are putting everyone near them at risk.  This is a matter of equal protection of the life and liberty of everyone, but particularly Black, Brown, indigenous, and elderly people, as well as those with conditions that put them at high risk, which is 40-60% of the population.  If the concerns are about opening the economy, making wearing face masks mandatory will do more to open the economy than anything else we could do.  But I mostly see it as protecting health, liberty, and lives, and caring for each other.  It is about equal protection.
nodes.author: Beth Bartlett
nodes.extracted: According to Dr. Rebecca Cosgrove, one of the COVID-19 experts at Fairview University, if everyone wore surgical masks in public, the spread of this virus would almost virtually come to a halt.

nodes.comment: Our lives are not dispensable. We have to slow the spread in NWA.
nodes.author: Tonya Truitt
nodes.extracted: We have to slow the spread in NWA.

nodes.comment: I want to reduce the spread of COVID-19 in my community to keep people in group homes and nursing homes safe. They are getting it from their care workers, family members & medical staff. The only way to keep them safe is to reduce the spread in the entire community.
nodes.author: Gaelynn Tressler
nodes.extracted: I want to reduce the spread of COVID-19 in my community to keep people in group homes and nursing homes safe. [...] The only way to keep them safe is to reduce the spread in the entire community.

nodes.comment: Wearing masks is one step to containing the spread of Coronavirus.   If you want to help the the community break this cycle and reduce the disruption to school and our lives from the pandemic, I and my medical colleagues strongly recommend this.  Please protect those most vulnerable including the teachers, school staff and our families.
nodes.author: Yvette Lam
nodes.extracted: Wearing masks is one step to containing the spread of Coronavirus.

nodes.comment: I think everyone is responsible to stop the spread of the virus, not just a few people
nodes.author: Diana Villegas
nodes.extracted: I think everyone is responsible to stop the spread of the virus, not just a few people

nodes.comment: masks protect and prevent the spread of COVID 19
nodes.author: paul hyman
nodes.extracted: masks protect and prevent the spread of COVID 19

nodes.comment: I believe face masks help prevent the spread of Covid.
nodes.author: Jennifer Hocking
nodes.extracted: I believe face masks help prevent the spread of Covid.

nodes.comment: The use of masks will get us faster and safer out of the crisis, it is a scientific fact that it helps, it is an act of respect towards our neighbor, it is a proactive way to stop the spread while being able to go ahead with our lives in the community. Countries like Taiwan and South Korea were able to keep open thanks to the coherent systematic use of masks that cover nose and mouth with zero exceptions. There is a correlation of spread of diseases and the lack of basic protection such as a simple mask.
nodes.author: Maribel Mansur
nodes.extracted: The use of masks will get us faster and safer out of the crisis, it is a scientific fact that it helps, it is an act of respect towards our neighbor, it is a proactive way to stop the spread while being able to go ahead with our lives in the community. [...] There is a correlation of spread of diseases and the lack of basic protection such as a simple mask.

nodes.comment: All my children are under 12 and can not yet get vaccinated.  Research shows that the viral load with Delta are substantially more than other variants, so children will spread the virus much more easily.  My husband is a high risk person and I want to protect the health of my family and my community.  Wearing a mask is simple and effective!
nodes.author: Alicia Long
nodes.extracted: Research shows that the viral load with Delta are substantially more than other variants, so children will spread the virus much more easily.

nodes.comment: I'm signing because it's the right thing to do so slow the spread of this virus.
nodes.author: Carrie Powell
nodes.extracted: I'm signing because it's the right thing to do so slow the spread of this virus.

nodes.comment: If masks are SO good at stopping the spread of the virus, why did @dc_draino, @fleccas, and @fogcitymidge ALL catch Jerry Nadler in D.C. walking the streets without a mask on???! ��
nodes.author: Hannah C
nodes.extracted: If masks are SO good at stopping the spread of the virus, why did @dc_draino, @fleccas, and @fogcitymidge ALL catch Jerry Nadler in D.C. walking the streets without a mask on???!

nodes.comment: I want to go shopping again....but I will not in establishments where people are not wearing masks.  I want to support our local businesses...but will not support them as long as there are mask-less customers or employees.  I do believe masks help slow the spread of this virus and I believe it is my responsibility to do the best I can to not spread this virus to other people.  Wearing a mask is no big deal. Most of us already wear face coverings during the winter or riding our motorcycles so get a grip. You can do it.
nodes.author: LINDA MALM
nodes.extracted: I do believe masks help slow the spread of this virus and I believe it is my responsibility to do the best I can to not spread this virus to other people.

nodes.comment: I'm a family physician who has seen first hand what happens with a lax or no masking policy in place.  Both of my kids quarantined in the first 7 days of school.  They will not be in school long, there will be increased spread in our community, and more suffering and death.
nodes.author: Benjamin Missick (Family Physician)
nodes.extracted: They will not be in school long, there will be increased spread in our community, and more suffering and death.

nodes.comment: As a pediatrician I am hoping  we can keep our children healthy and safe in school.  Masking will help decrease the spread of Covid.
nodes.author: sarah moore
nodes.extracted: Masking will help decrease the spread of Covid.

nodes.comment: Anyone who is not vaccinated should wear a mask to help stop the spread of COVID19. If we want our kids back in school we all need to do our part!
nodes.author: Maureen Kohn
nodes.extracted: Anyone who is not vaccinated should wear a mask to help stop the spread of COVID19.

nodes.comment: I feel we are not controlling the spread. I acquired Covid in an outside restaurant. We need to have stricter enforcement and spacing. I am also a Respiratory Therspist and I am retired but feel retired therapists are not being called and we should be.
nodes.author: Danita Woodhurst
nodes.extracted: I feel we are not controlling the spread.

nodes.comment: Because wearing a mask is the ONLY way to slow the spread. I wear a mask for you you wear one for me.
nodes.author: Brooke Pekkala
nodes.extracted: Because wearing a mask is the ONLY way to slow the spread.

nodes.comment: This is safety first and preventing the spread.
nodes.author: Wendy Richardson
nodes.extracted: This is safety first and preventing the spread.

nodes.comment: I am signing because I want to protect the children and stop the spread of the virus.
nodes.author: Joanne Pfeifer
nodes.extracted: I am signing because I want to protect the children and stop the spread of the virus.

nodes.comment: With Florida being a hot bed in the US at this time for the spread of the delta variant, Pinellas County Schools should strongly consider requiring masks as we enter the 21-22 school year.
nodes.author: Nancy Synychak
nodes.extracted: With Florida being a hot bed in the US at this time for the spread of the delta variant, Pinellas County Schools should strongly consider requiring masks as we enter the 21-22 school year.

nodes.comment: My 9 year old son has severe asthma and his Nana has end-stage COPD. This virus is potentially deadly to them both! We want to be safe in school with masks so we don't spread this deadly virus to the ones we love!
nodes.author: Denise McCollum
nodes.extracted: We want to be safe in school with masks so we don't spread this deadly virus to the ones we love!

nodes.comment: I support this 100%. This is an easy, effective way to slow down the spread of Covid 19. We all must do our part.
nodes.author: Teri Manisto
nodes.extracted: This is an easy, effective way to slow down the spread of Covid 19.

nodes.comment: I do work in Duluth during the school year and definitely want to keep the spread of Covid down!
nodes.author: Mary Jo Merrick-Lockett
nodes.extracted: I do work in Duluth during the school year and definitely want to keep the spread of Covid down!

nodes.comment: To hopefully reduce the spread of COVID 19 and prevent unnecessary deaths.
nodes.author: Chad Brown
nodes.extracted: To hopefully reduce the spread of COVID 19 and prevent unnecessary deaths.

nodes.comment: Wearing a mask will help stop the spread of the virus!
nodes.author: Marybeth Worcheck
nodes.extracted: Wearing a mask will help stop the spread of the virus!

nodes.comment: all public health experts agree masks are an essential tool in slowing the spread of coronavirus
nodes.author: Smith College Parent

nodes.comment: Children are able to get delta and spread delta. Don't be stupid. Protect our children and families.
